document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 22''' was released in March/April of 1990. It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:
document_data.Letters:
: '''p.2-3'''
The ''Dungeon'' magazine letters column. One of the answered letters writes in about the ''Forgotten Realms'' set adventure ''[[Dungeon magazine 20/The Ship of Night|The Ship of Night]]'', from [[Dungeon magazine 20|''Dungeon'' #20]], pointing out that the unique ''[[wand of petrification]]'' featured therein was never detailed and asks for information on it. The editors respond by providing a detailed rundown of the wand's description and powers. {{Dusup|22/Letters}}
